placeShip(Point, Ship) - Method in class com.futuresailors.battleships.model.Grid
Drops the ship onto the grid and marks the tiles it has been placed as S.
placeShip(Point) - Method in class com.futuresailors.battleships.model.Ship
Initialises the tiles array based on the top left hand tile.
placeShips() - Method in class com.futuresailors.battleships.ai.AdvancedAI
Hard AI Places its ships.
placeShips() - Method in interface com.futuresailors.battleships.ai.AI
The Ships will be given to the AI on the constructor.
placeShips() - Method in class com.futuresailors.battleships.ai.ModerateAI
Moderate AI places its ships.
placeShips() - Method in class com.futuresailors.battleships.ai.SimpleAI
Determines the coordinates of where ships will be placed by generating random numbers and provided they are in a suitable position then they placed on the board.
PlaceShipsController - Class in com.futuresailors.battleships.controller
This controller adds a PlaceShipsPanel to the window and is used to allow users to choose the tiles they wish to place their ships in.
PlaceShipsController(Grid, Ship[], GameTypeController, JFrame) - Constructor for class com.futuresailors.battleships.controller.PlaceShipsController
Creates the panel, adds it to the window and adds the listener.
PlaceShipsPanel - Class in com.futuresailors.battleships.view
The panel that displays the grid and loops through the ships for that game type.
